20110129050109.000|20110129050111.000|CC1|>> BOMB DETECTORS THAT DON'T    
20110129050111.000|20110129050112.000|CC1|DETECT.

20110129050115.000|20110129050123.000|CC1|WORLD?                          
20110129050123.000|20110129050125.000|CC1|AN INVESTIGATION HAS FOUND THE  
20110129050125.000|20110129050128.000|CC1|U.K. GOVERNMENT HELPED SELL BOMB
20110129050128.000|20110129050130.000|CC1|DETECTORS WHICH ARE SUBJECT TO A
20110129050130.000|20110129050131.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT EXPORT BAN BECAUSE   
20110129050131.000|20110129050133.000|CC1|THEY PUT LIVES AT RISK.         
20110129050133.000|20110129050136.000|CC1|WE ALSO REVEALED THE DEVICES ARE
20110129050136.000|20110129050139.000|CC1|STILL BEING SOLD.               
20110129050139.000|20110129050141.000|CC1|>> WHEN THIS COUNTRY EXPORTS    
20110129050141.000|20110129050143.000|CC1|SOMETHING, IT SHOULD WORK.      
20110129050143.000|20110129050146.000|CC1|IT SHOULD WORK WHEN PEOPLE'S    
20110129050146.000|20110129050148.000|CC1|LIVES ARE AT SUCH RISK.         
20110129050148.000|20110129050150.000|CC1|>> A RARE INTERVIEW WITH ONE OF 
20110129050150.000|20110129050152.000|CC1|THE MOST CONTROVERSIAL WOMEN IN 
20110129050152.000|20110129050153.000|CC1|SPORTS.                         
20110129050153.000|20110129050155.000|CC1|SHE TELLS US ABOUT THE PRESSURE 
20110129050155.000|20110129050158.000|CC1|OF FACING THIS GENDER ISSUE.    
20110129050158.000|20110129050201.000|CC1|THE SHOCK WAVES IN THE TUNISIAN 
20110129050201.000|20110129050203.000|CC1|UPRISING THAT HAVE SPREAD TO    
20110129050203.000|20110129050204.000|CC1|JORDAN.                         
20110129050204.000|20110129050206.000|CC1|>> ONCE RARE, THEY ARE BECOMING 
20110129050206.000|20110129050208.000|CC1|PROMINENT.                      
20110129050208.000|20110129050210.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED IN TUNISIA ARE    
20110129050210.000|20110129050215.000|CC1|HAPPENING AROUND THE WORLD.     
20110129050215.000|20110129050222.000|CC1|>> IT WAS -- AN EXPLOSIVE       
20110129050222.000|20110129050225.000|CC1|DETECTION IS SUPPOSED TO DETECT 
20110129050225.000|20110129050227.000|CC1|SUICIDE BOMBERS.                
20110129050227.000|20110129050229.000|CC1|THE EXPORTER OF THE DETECTORS   
20110129050229.000|20110129050230.000|CC1|FROM THE U.K. WAS BANNED BECAUSE
20110129050230.000|20110129050232.000|CC1|OF THE THREAT THEY POSED TO     
20110129050232.000|20110129050235.000|CC1|TROOPS.                         
20110129050235.000|20110129050240.000|CC1|BETWEEN 2001-2005 SOMEONE FROM  
20110129050240.000|20110129050241.000|CC1|THE ARMY HELPED MARKET THESE    
20110129050241.000|20110129050243.000|CC1|DEVICES ARE AROUND THE WORLD.   
20110129050243.000|20110129050245.000|CC1|THEY HAVE COST A FEW POUNDS TO  
20110129050245.000|20110129050250.000|CC1|MAKE BUT HAVE COST 15,000       
20110129050250.000|20110129050250.000|CC1|POUNDS.                         
20110129050250.000|20110129050257.000|CC1|>> THE CAPITAL OF MALTA ON THE  
20110129050257.000|20110129050300.000|CC1|TRAIL OF A DEEPLY TROUBLED      
20110129050300.000|20110129050301.000|CC1|INTERNATIONAL TRAIN WHICH LIVES 
20110129050301.000|20110129050303.000|CC1|ARE AT STAKE.                   
20110129050303.000|20110129050305.000|CC1|IT WAS ONE OF THE FIRST         
20110129050305.000|20110129050307.000|CC1|COUNTRIES TARGETED BY BRITISH   
20110129050307.000|20110129050309.000|CC1|ZEALOTS.                        
20110129050309.000|20110129050315.000|CC1|OF A -- IT IS ONE OF THE        
20110129050315.000|20110129050316.000|CC1|DETECTORS WITH A PLASTIC HANDLE 
20110129050316.000|20110129050318.000|CC1|WITH AN AREA THAT SWIVELS IN THE
20110129050318.000|20110129050320.000|CC1|DIRECTION OF WHAT YOU ARE TRYING
20110129050320.000|20110129050321.000|CC1|TO DETECT.                      
20110129050321.000|20110129050324.000|CC1|BUT THERE ARE NO WORKING        
20110129050324.000|20110129050326.000|CC1|ELECTRONICS IN IT AT ALL.       
20110129050326.000|20110129050328.000|CC1|DESPITE THAT, THEY HAVE SOLD IN 
20110129050328.000|20110129050332.000|CC1|EVERY CORNER OF THE GLOBE.      
20110129050332.000|20110129050335.000|CC1|THEY CAN COST AS LITTLE AS 10   
20110129050335.000|20110129050336.000|CC1|POUNDS TO MAKE BUT THEY ARE     
20110129050336.000|20110129050342.000|CC1|SELLING FOR THOUSANDS EACH.     
20110129050342.000|20110129050346.000|CC1|[INAUDIBLE]                     
20110129050346.000|20110129050348.000|CC1|THERE IS AN ELABORATE SALES     
20110129050348.000|20110129050352.000|CC1|PITCH -- THE MALTESE POLICE WERE
20110129050352.000|20110129050355.000|CC1|PERSUADED TO PART WITH LARGE    
20110129050355.000|20110129050357.000|CC1|SUMS OF MONEY FOR THE DEVICE.   
20110129050357.000|20110129050358.000|CC1|THEY SAID THEY HAVE BOUGHT      
20110129050358.000|20110129050359.000|CC1|ANOTHER ONE.                    
20110129050359.000|20110129050401.000|CC1|BUT THE POLICE WERE NOT THE ONLY
20110129050401.000|20110129050404.000|CC1|ONES TO BE APPROACHED.          
20110129050404.000|20110129050409.000|CC1|IN 2000 [INAUDIBLE]             
20110129050409.000|20110129050412.000|CC1|THIS MAN IS NOW HEAD OF AIRPORT 
20110129050412.000|20110129050414.000|CC1|SECURITY, BUT BACK THEN HE WAS  
20110129050414.000|20110129050417.000|CC1|IN CHARGE OF DOG HANDLING TEAMS.
20110129050417.000|20110129050419.000|CC1|HE WANTED TO KNOW IF THE        
20110129050419.000|20110129050420.000|CC1|DETECTORS COULD FIND A LARGE    
20110129050420.000|20110129050422.000|CC1|STACK OF DRUGS HIDDEN AWAY.     
20110129050422.000|20110129050424.000|CC1|>> THEY HAD A SUBSTANTIAL AMOUNT
20110129050424.000|20110129050428.000|CC1|OF DRUGS IN AN AREA WHICH I USED
20110129050428.000|20110129050431.000|CC1|FOR DOG TRAINING.               
20110129050431.000|20110129050433.000|CC1|THE EQUIPMENT HAD TO WORK AS WE 
20110129050433.000|20110129050440.000|CC1|WERE TOLD -- IT WOULD HAVE BEEN 
20110129050440.000|20110129050442.000|CC1|TRIGGERED BY THE AMOUNT OF      
20110129050442.000|20110129050444.000|CC1|DRUGS.                          
20110129050444.000|20110129050448.000|CC1|I KNEW SOMETHING WAS WRONG.     
20110129050448.000|20110129050451.000|CC1|>> IF IT CANNOT DETECT DRUGS OR 
20110129050451.000|20110129050454.000|CC1|EXPLOSIVES, WHY DOES THIS MOVE? 
20110129050454.000|20110129050457.000|CC1|>> IT IS A TOY.                 
20110129050457.000|20110129050500.000|CC1|IF I WANT THE EQUIPMENT TO POINT
20110129050500.000|20110129050505.000|CC1|AT YOU, IT HAS BEEN DONE.       
20110129050505.000|20110129050508.000|CC1|IT IS JUST THE WAY YOU SWING    
20110129050508.000|20110129050515.000|CC1|YOUR WRIST, THERE IT GOES.      
20110129050515.000|20110129050517.000|CC1|>> THESE PICTURES SHOW THE ARMY 
20110129050517.000|20110129050519.000|CC1|TESTING ONE OF THE DETECTORS AT 
20110129050519.000|20110129050520.000|CC1|THE AIRPORT.                    
20110129050520.000|20110129050523.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO OFFICIALS, THIS IS 
20110129050523.000|20110129050525.000|CC1|THE PLACE THE BOMB EXPLODED OVER
20110129050525.000|20110129050528.000|CC1|LOCKERBIE IN 1988.              
20110129050528.000|20110129050531.000|CC1|IT KILLED 270 PEOPLE.           
20110129050531.000|20110129050534.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH THE BRITISH ARMY NEVER 
20110129050534.000|20110129050536.000|CC1|USED ANY OF THESE DETECTORS     
20110129050536.000|20110129050538.000|CC1|THEMSELVES, IT WAS INVOLVED IN  
20110129050538.000|20110129050541.000|CC1|PROMOTING THEM ABROAD.          
20110129050541.000|20110129050544.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT AND ENGINEERS    
20110129050544.000|20110129050545.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATED THAN IN SEVERAL    
20110129050545.000|20110129050546.000|CC1|COUNTRIES.                      
20110129050546.000|20110129050548.000|CC1|IT IS ALSO ADMITS THE DEPARTMENT
20110129050548.000|20110129050551.000|CC1|OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY HELPED    
20110129050551.000|20110129050553.000|CC1|MARKET THEM TO MEXICO AND THE   
20110129050553.000|20110129050553.000|CC1|PHILIPPINES.                    
20110129050553.000|20110129050555.000|CC1|THE ADMISSION THAT THE          
20110129050555.000|20110129050602.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT GAVE THEM CAME AFTER 
20110129050602.000|20110129050602.000|CC1|A FREEDOM OF INFORMATION        
20110129050602.000|20110129050604.000|CC1|REQUEST.                        
20110129050604.000|20110129050608.000|CC1|>> THE GOVERNMENT WAS EMPLOYING 
20110129050608.000|20110129050609.000|CC1|A BRITISH ARMY PERSONNEL TO     
20110129050609.000|20110129050611.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATE THESE PHONY BOMB    
20110129050611.000|20110129050614.000|CC1|DETECTORS WHICH WERE COMPLETELY 
20110129050614.000|20110129050616.000|CC1|INEFFECTIVE.                    
20110129050616.000|20110129050618.000|CC1|THEY EFFECTIVELY GAVE THE BOMB  
20110129050618.000|20110129050620.000|CC1|DETECTION TO THE BRITISH        
20110129050620.000|20110129050621.000|CC1|MILITARY.                       
20110129050621.000|20110129050624.000|CC1|IT ALLOWS THEM TO SELL THESE ALL
20110129050624.000|20110129050628.000|CC1|AROUND THE WORLD, WHICH MAY     
20110129050628.000|20110129050629.000|CC1|RESULT IN THE DEATHS OF ON TOLD 
20110129050629.000|20110129050632.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129050632.000|20110129050635.000|CC1|-- UNTOLD PEOPLE.               
20110129050635.000|20110129050637.000|CC1|>> BAGHDAD 2009.                
20110129050637.000|20110129050639.000|CC1|A STRING OF EXPLOSIONS THAT YEAR
20110129050639.000|20110129050641.000|CC1|TOOK HUNDREDS OF LIVES AND      
20110129050641.000|20110129050643.000|CC1|RAISED QUESTIONS ABOUT THE --   
20110129050643.000|20110129050644.000|CC1|HOW THE BOMBS WERE GETTING      
20110129050644.000|20110129050646.000|CC1|THROUGH.                        
20110129050646.000|20110129050649.000|CC1|THE SPOTLIGHT FELL ON DESK.     
20110129050649.000|20110129050652.000|CC1|IT WAS -- THE SPOTLIGHT FELL ON 
20110129050652.000|20110129050657.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20110129050657.000|20110129050659.000|CC1|WITH THE HELP OF CAMBRIDGE      
20110129050659.000|20110129050701.000|CC1|UNIVERSITY WE PROVE ONE A YEAR  
20110129050701.000|20110129050704.000|CC1|AGO IT CANNOT WORK.             
20110129050704.000|20110129050707.000|CC1|A CARD MEANT TO DETECT TNT      
20110129050707.000|20110129050709.000|CC1|CONTAINED NOTHING BUT A CHEAP   
20110129050709.000|20110129050712.000|CC1|ANTI-THEFT TAG.                 
20110129050712.000|20110129050717.000|CC1|>> IT COULD NOT DETECT TNT.     
20110129050717.000|20110129050719.000|CC1|>> THE GOVERNMENT SENT THEM TO  
20110129050719.000|20110129050721.000|CC1|IRAQ AND AFGHANISTAN.           
20110129050721.000|20110129050723.000|CC1|THEY COULD ENDANGER BRITISH OR  
20110129050723.000|20110129050730.000|CC1|FRIENDLY FORCES.                
20110129050730.000|20110129050733.000|CC1|AFTER FBI WARNINGS THEY WERE A  
20110129050733.000|20110129050734.000|CC1|FRAUD, BRITAIN BECAME A NEW     
20110129050734.000|20110129050736.000|CC1|[UNINTELLIGIBLE]                
20110129050736.000|20110129050739.000|CC1|THIS WAS THE MOLD.              
20110129050739.000|20110129050742.000|CC1|BUT AFTER LAB TESTS PROVED IT   
20110129050742.000|20110129050745.000|CC1|DID NOT WORK, THE MAN BEHIND IT 
20110129050745.000|20110129050746.000|CC1|WENT THEIR SEPARATE WAYS AND    
20110129050746.000|20110129050748.000|CC1|SOLD THEM AROUND THE WORLD UNDER
20110129050748.000|20110129050751.000|CC1|DIFFERENT WAYS.                 
20110129050751.000|20110129050757.000|CC1|AMONG THEM, THE ALPHA 6.        
20110129050757.000|20110129050759.000|CC1|LAST YEAR POLICE RAIDED SEVERAL 
20110129050759.000|20110129050802.000|CC1|BUSINESSES AND CONFISCATED      
20110129050802.000|20110129050804.000|CC1|HUNDREDS OF THE DEVICES.        
20110129050804.000|20110129050805.000|CC1|THE FOREIGN OFFICE WARNED       
20110129050805.000|20110129050807.000|CC1|COUNTRIES THEY DID NOT WORK, BUT
20110129050807.000|20110129050809.000|CC1|NO ACTION HAS BEEN TAKEN TO BAN 
20110129050809.000|20110129050811.000|CC1|THEIR EXPORT TO COUNTRIES OTHER 
20110129050811.000|20110129050814.000|CC1|THAN IRAQ AND AFGHANISTAN       
20110129050814.000|20110129050816.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE IMPACT OF ANY       
20110129050816.000|20110129050817.000|CC1|FURTHER U.K. ACTION IN          
20110129050817.000|20110129050820.000|CC1|PREVENTING THE SUPPLY WOULD BE  
20110129050820.000|20110129050822.000|CC1|LIMITED IF THEY ARE AVAILABLE   
20110129050822.000|20110129050823.000|CC1|ELSEWHERE.                      
20110129050823.000|20110129050825.000|CC1|BUT MANY CONCERNED SAY THAT IS  
20110129050825.000|20110129050827.000|CC1|NOT GOOD ENOUGH.                
20110129050827.000|20110129050830.000|CC1|>> IT SEEMS TO ME JOHN.         
20110129050830.000|20110129050835.000|CC1|-- IT SEEMS TO BE JUNK.         
20110129050835.000|20110129050837.000|CC1|IF THIS IS PRESENTED AS A DEVICE
20110129050837.000|20110129050840.000|CC1|THAT DETECTS BOMBS, AND HAS TO  
20110129050840.000|20110129050841.000|CC1|BE STOPPED.                     
20110129050841.000|20110129050845.000|CC1|-- IT HAS TO BE STOPPED.        
20110129050845.000|20110129050846.000|CC1|WE REALLY NEED TO DO SOMETHING  
20110129050846.000|20110129050847.000|CC1|ABOUT THIS.                     
20110129050847.000|20110129050849.000|CC1|>> THE MAN WHO MADE MILLIONS    
20110129050849.000|20110129050851.000|CC1|THROUGH SALES TO IRAQ IS STILL  
20110129050851.000|20110129050854.000|CC1|ON BAIL AFTER BEING ARRESTED ON 
20110129050854.000|20110129050855.000|CC1|SUSPICION OF FRAUD AND          
20110129050855.000|20110129050857.000|CC1|MISREPRESENTATION.              
20110129050857.000|20110129050900.000|CC1|WE HAVE NOW LEARNED OF A NEW    
20110129050900.000|20110129050904.000|CC1|ATTEMPT TO ENTER BRITISH FORCES 
20110129050904.000|20110129050904.000|CC1|WITH A NEW DEVICE.              
20110129050904.000|20110129050906.000|CC1|LOOK FAMILIAR?                  
20110129050906.000|20110129050909.000|CC1|THERE ARE CLAIMS THIS CAN DETECT
20110129050909.000|20110129050910.000|CC1|ALL KINDS OF EXPLOSIVES THROUGH 
20110129050910.000|20110129050914.000|CC1|STEEL BARRIERS AND UP TO 100    
20110129050914.000|20110129050915.000|CC1|METERS AWAY.                    
20110129050915.000|20110129050920.000|CC1|>> [UNINTELLIGIBLE]             
20110129050920.000|20110129050923.000|CC1|>> THIS IS AN EXPLOSIVES EXPERT 
20110129050923.000|20110129050926.000|CC1|WHO MAKES THIS DEVICE USED BY   
20110129050926.000|20110129050927.000|CC1|SPECIAL FORCES UNDER HOSTAGE    
20110129050927.000|20110129050928.000|CC1|RESCUE.                         
20110129050928.000|20110129050931.000|CC1|MANY OF HIS INVENTIONS ARE USED 
20110129050931.000|20110129050933.000|CC1|IN AFGHANISTAN TO DIFFUSE       
20110129050933.000|20110129050934.000|CC1|ROADSIDE BOMBS.                 
20110129050934.000|20110129050937.000|CC1|LAST YEAR HE HELPED US EXPOSE   
20110129050937.000|20110129050938.000|CC1|THESE BOGUS DETECTORS.          
20110129050938.000|20110129050942.000|CC1|>> [UNINTELLIGIBLE]             
20110129050942.000|20110129050944.000|CC1|>> HE SAID HE WAS ASTONISHED TO 
20110129050944.000|20110129050946.000|CC1|HEAR A FEW MONTHS AGO SUCH      
20110129050946.000|20110129050948.000|CC1|DEVICES WERE STILL BEING        
20110129050948.000|20110129050951.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATED.                   
20110129050951.000|20110129050954.000|CC1|>> IT IS POSSIBLE TO BE         
20110129050954.000|20110129050958.000|CC1|TECHNOLOGICAL VERY COMPETENT,   
20110129050958.000|20110129051000.000|CC1|BUT TO BE EXTREMELY NAIVE IN    
20110129051000.000|20110129051002.000|CC1|OTHER DIRECTIONS.               
20110129051002.000|20110129051004.000|CC1|>> THE MAN WHO SHOWED THE       
20110129051004.000|20110129051006.000|CC1|ENGINEERS THIS DETECTOR IS THE  
20110129051006.000|20110129051009.000|CC1|RETIRED ARMY COLONEL.           
20110129051009.000|20110129051011.000|CC1|WE CAME TO ASK HIM WHY HE WAS   
20110129051011.000|20110129051012.000|CC1|PROMOTING IT.                   
20110129051012.000|20110129051014.000|CC1|>> IT SEEMS TO ME THIS IS       
20110129051014.000|20110129051016.000|CC1|ANYTHING THAT HAS A POSITIVE    
20110129051016.000|20110129051021.000|CC1|OUTCOME, CAN EVEN HELP A LITTLE 
20110129051021.000|20110129051023.000|CC1|BIT WITH AFGHANISTAN, THEN WE   
20110129051023.000|20110129051024.000|CC1|SHOULD LOOK AT IT SERIOUSLY.    
20110129051024.000|20110129051026.000|CC1|WE SHOULD NOT JUST DISMISS IT.  
20110129051026.000|20110129051031.000|CC1|>> THE MAKER'S DISTRIBUTED A    
20110129051031.000|20110129051032.000|CC1|STATEMENT SAYING THEY WERE A    
20110129051032.000|20110129051036.000|CC1|MASSIVE SCAM, BUT THIS DEVICE   
20110129051036.000|20110129051038.000|CC1|WAS DIFFERENT.                  
20110129051038.000|20110129051041.000|CC1|IT WAS DISPLAYED AT THE TERROR  
20110129051041.000|20110129051046.000|CC1|SHOW AND SHOWED CUSTOMERS IT    
20110129051046.000|20110129051047.000|CC1|PROVED EXTREMELY SUCCESSFUL IN  
20110129051047.000|20110129051049.000|CC1|SEVERAL COUNTRIES.              
20110129051049.000|20110129051051.000|CC1|>> IT IS INTANGIBLE SCIENCE TO  
20110129051051.000|20110129051053.000|CC1|ME THAT I WOULD NEWT -- NOT USE 
20110129051053.000|20110129051056.000|CC1|IT IN A LIFE OR DEATH SITUATION.
20110129051056.000|20110129051059.000|CC1|I PUT IT HERE BECAUSE I WANTED  
20110129051059.000|20110129051103.000|CC1|IT TO BE LOOKED AT IF YOU FEEL  
20110129051103.000|20110129051104.000|CC1|THEY ARE GAINING AN EDGE BY MY  
20110129051104.000|20110129051108.000|CC1|INVOLVEMENT, I WOULD PROBABLY   
20110129051108.000|20110129051110.000|CC1|SAY I AM GUILTY.                
20110129051110.000|20110129051112.000|CC1|>> JOHN WOULD HAVE MADE 3000    
20110129051112.000|20110129051117.000|CC1|EUROS PROFIT ON EACH DETECTOR.  
20110129051117.000|20110129051120.000|CC1|HE HAS NOT SOLD ANY SO FAR.     
20110129051120.000|20110129051125.000|CC1|BUT THE MANUFACTURER HAS SOLD   
20110129051125.000|20110129051126.000|CC1|THIS AND A VIRTUALLY IDENTICAL  
20110129051126.000|20110129051129.000|CC1|DEVICE AROUND THE WORLD.        
20110129051129.000|20110129051132.000|CC1|THE U.S. NAVY TESTED IT IN 2005
